raw: * Fired when the lifecycle method {@link #start} of any {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page page} is called

@description.body: Fired when the lifecycle method {@link #start} of any {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page page} is called

raw: * Fired when the lifecycle method {@link #stop} of any {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page page} is called

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the lifecycle method {@link #stop} of any {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page page} is called

raw: * Fired when the method {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#back} is called. It is possible to prevent
* the back event on {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page} by calling the
* {@link qx.event.type.Event#preventDefault}. Data indicating whether the action
* was triggered by a key event or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the method {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page#back} is called. It is possible to prevent the back event on {@link qx.ui.mobile.page.Page} by calling the {@link qx.event.type.Event#preventDefault}. Data indicating whether the action was triggered by a key event or not.

raw: * Fired when a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup popup} appears on screen.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup popup} appears on screen.

raw: interface method
* Returns the application's root widget.
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} The application's root widget.
* Returns the application's routing.
* @return {qx.application.Routing} The application's routing.
* Creates the application's root widget. Override this function to create
* your own root widget.
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget} The application's root widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the application's root widget. Override this function to create your own root widget.

raw: interface method
interface method
interface method
* Translate a message
* Mark the message for translation.
* @param messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)
* @param varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
* @return {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a message Mark the message for translation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: messageId {String} message id (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

raw: * Translate a plural message
* Mark the messages for translation.
* Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.
* @param singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)
* @param pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)
* @param count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.
* @param varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string
* @return {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Translate a plural message Mark the messages for translation. Depending on the third argument the plural or the singular form is chosen.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: singularMessageId {String} message id of the singular form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: pluralMessageId {String} message id of the plural form (may contain format strings)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: count {Integer} if greater than 1 the plural form otherwise the singular form is returned.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: varargs {Object?} variable number of arguments applied to the format string

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|LocalizedString} The translated message or localized string
